name: Pong - You are not paddle
description:
This game looks like Pong.

But You are not paddle!! You are ball!!

Let's play from the perspective of the ball.

This game was influenced by 'Ding Dong XL' and 'Pong'.

The best record with players from all over the world.We are considering additional contents as skin lotion, other record competition, and access arrangements.

game method

Touch the screen and move left and right to 'ball'.

The point is to adjust the speed by referring to the left gauge.

Difficult! Challenges and Ranking System! Let's compete with global users for ranking.
